alert.note: Alert for Kingman; Reno; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 10:11PM CDT until June 17 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Reno County in south central Kansas... Western Sedgwick County in south central Kansas... Eastern Kingman County in south central Kansas... Northwestern Sumner County in south central Kansas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1011 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pretty Prairie, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Cheney, Haven, Garden Plain, Mount Hope, Andale, Norwich, Yoder, Murdock, Waterloo, Cheney Lake, Mt Vernon, Rago and Cheney State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
